headline: Compared to Estimates, Devon Energy (DVN) Q1 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Devon Energy (DVN) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.
